universum.studios.android.officium.sync

Class BaseSyncManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.officium.sync.BaseSyncManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnSyncTaskStateChangeListener

    public abstract class BaseSyncManager
extends Object
implements OnSyncTaskStateChangeListener
    Base class that can be used for implementation of managers responsible for requesting of synchronization operations to be performed. Each implementation of BaseSyncManager can request synchronization only for a single content authority specified during initialization of BaseSyncManager and for a single Account that should be picked by a specific BaseSyncManager implementation whenever pickAccountForSync() is called.

    To request synchronization for a specific SyncTask call requestSync(SyncTask) method. If a global synchronization should be performed, call requestGlobalSync(). Base synchronization manager class implements also some configuration methods like to start/stop automatic synchronization via startAutomaticSync() and stopAutomaticSync() or to check whether there are some synchronization operations pending or active via isSyncPedning() and isSyncPedning(). Any additional methods may be freely implemented by the inheritance hierarchies.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

        public BaseSyncManager(@NonNull
                       Context context,
                       @NonNull
                       String authority)
        Creates a new instance of BaseSyncManager with the given context and authority.
        Parameters:
        context - Context that may be used by inheritance hierarchies to access application data and services needed to perform requested synchronization.
        authority - The content authority which should the manager use when requesting synchronization operations via ContentResolver.
        See Also:
        getContext(), getAuthority()

      • getAuthority

        @NonNull
public final String getAuthority()
        Returns the content authority with which has been this manager created. The authority is used whenever this manager is requesting synchronization operations via ContentResolver.
        Returns:
        The associated content authority.
        See Also:
        BaseSyncManager(Context, String)

      • startAutomaticSync

        public void startAutomaticSync()
        Starts automatic synchronization for the content authority specified for this manager and account picked for synchronization by this manager implementation.

        This method requires the caller to hold PERMISSION_WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS permission.

        See Also:
        stopAutomaticSync(), ContentResolver.setSyncAutomatically(Account, String, boolean)

      • isAutomaticSyncRunning

        public boolean isAutomaticSyncRunning()
        Checks whether the automatic synchronization is running (enabled).

        This method requires the caller to hold PERMISSION_READ_SYNC_SETTINGS permission.

        Returns:
        True if the automatic synchronization is running at this time, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        startAutomaticSync(), stopAutomaticSync()

      • stopAutomaticSync

        public void stopAutomaticSync()
        Stops automatic synchronization for the content authority specified for this manager and account picked for synchronization by this manager implementation.

        This method requires the caller to hold PERMISSION_WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS permission.

        See Also:
        startAutomaticSync(), ContentResolver.setSyncAutomatically(Account, String, boolean)

      • requestGlobalSync

        public void requestGlobalSync()
        Same as requestSync(SyncTask) with sync task with SyncTask.DEFAULT_ID id.

      • requestSync

        public void requestSync(@NonNull
                        SyncTask syncTask)
        Requests synchronization operation to be performed for the specified syncTask. Synchronization will be requested for the content authority specified for this manager and account picked for synchronization by this manager implementation.

        If there is successfully picked synchronization account, a Bundle for sync adapter is created with the following extras:

        • SYNC_EXTRAS_MANUAL: true
        • SYNC_EXTRAS_EXPEDITED: true
        • SyncTask put into the extras Bundle
        Parameters:
        syncTask - The desired task for which to request synchronization. This task will be put into Bundle along with other sync extras for the sync adapter registered for this Android application.
        See Also:
        requestGlobalSync(), ContentResolver.requestSync(Account, String, Bundle)

      • shouldRequestSync

        protected boolean shouldRequestSync(@NonNull
                                    SyncTask syncTask,
                                    @NonNull
                                    Account account)
        Called from requestSync(SyncTask) to check whether a synchronization should be requested for the specified syncTask and account.

        This implementation returns always true.

        Parameters:
        syncTask - The sync task for which to check if synchronization should be requested.
        account - The account for which to request synchronization.
        Returns:
        True if requestSync(SyncTask) should proceed and request synchronization via ContentResolver.requestSync(Account, String, Bundle) for the task and account, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        pickAccountForSync()

      • onSyncTaskStateChanged

        @CallSuper
public void onSyncTaskStateChanged(@NonNull
                                              SyncTask syncTask,
                                              @NonNull
                                              Account account)
        Description copied from interface: OnSyncTaskStateChangeListener
        Invoked whenever a state of the specified syncTask has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onSyncTaskStateChanged in interface OnSyncTaskStateChangeListener
        Parameters:
        syncTask - The task of which state has changed.
        account - The account for which has been requested synchronization associated with the sync task.
        See Also:
        SyncTask.getState()

      • isSyncPedning

        @Deprecated
public boolean isSyncPedning()
        Deprecated. Use isSyncPending() instead.
        This method has been deprecated and will be removed in the next release.

        Checks whether there are any pending synchronizations for the content authority specified for this manager and account picked for synchronization by this manager implementation.

        This method requires the caller to hold PERMISSION_READ_SYNC_STATS permission.

        Returns:
        True if there are some synchronizations pending, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ContentResolver.isSyncPending(Account, String), isSyncActive(), cancelSync()

      • isSyncPending

        public boolean isSyncPending()
        Checks whether there are any pending synchronizations for the content authority specified for this manager and account picked for synchronization by this manager implementation.

        This method requires the caller to hold PERMISSION_READ_SYNC_STATS permission.

        Returns:
        True if there are some synchronizations pending, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ContentResolver.isSyncPending(Account, String), isSyncActive(), cancelSync()

      • isSyncActive

        public boolean isSyncActive()
        Checks whether there is currently a synchronization being processed for the content authority specified for this manager and account picked for synchronization by this manager implementation.

        This method requires the caller to hold PERMISSION_READ_SYNC_STATS permission.

        Returns:
        True if synchronization is active at this time, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ContentResolver.isSyncActive(Account, String), isSyncPedning(), cancelSync()

      • cancelSync

        public void cancelSync()
        Cancels any active or pending synchronizations that match the content authority specified for this manager and account picked for synchronization by this manager implementation.
        See Also:
        ContentResolver.cancelSync(Account, String), isSyncActive(), isSyncPedning()

      • onCancelSync

        protected void onCancelSync(@NonNull
                            Account account)
        Invoked whenever cancelSync() is called.

        Default implementation cancels current sync via ContentResolver.cancelSync(Account, String) for the specified account and authority specified for this manager.

        Parameters:
        account - The account picked via pickAccountForSync().

      • pickAccountForSync

        @Nullable
protected abstract Account pickAccountForSync()
        Called to pick account for the current synchronization related request dispatched to this manager.
        Returns:
        Account for which should be performed synchronization request, whether startAutomaticSync(), stopAutomaticSync(), requestGlobalSync(), requestSync(SyncTask), isSyncActive(), isSyncPedning(), cancelSync().
